entry.title: $2299 // Unreal 2 Bedroom in Williamsburg!
entry.content:
Unreal Deal!

Here's a newly tailored and HUGE, Two Bedroom Apt in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, nestled between the J/M/Z at Lorimer and the L at Montrose Ave.

This unit offers all new finishes, stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, hardwood floors. Great Natural sunlight, spacious bedrooms with closets, an updated bathroom plus much more.

Heat & Hot Included. No Fee!

This location offers effortless commuting to Manhattan as well as a wide variety of neighborhood nightlife, shopping, and dining.

Favorites include EastWick, Samurai Papa, Sweet Science, Win Son, DuckDuck, The Graham, The Rosemont, Tradesman and more!

Inquire today, be sure to include your move date, availability and best method of contact to ensure a quick response!

Good Credit/Good Income
(Guarantors Accepted)

No Pets
